p: BMGY, buffered glycerol-complex medium; CCK-8, Cell-Counting Kit 8; FIP, fungal immunomodulatory protein; FIP-nha, FIP from Nectria haematococca; FIP-ppl, Postia placenta; JTT, Jones-Taylor-Thornton; NJ, Neighbor-Joining; OD, optical density; SDS-PAGE, sodium dodecyl sulfate-polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis; YNB, yeast nitrogen base; YPD, yeast extract peptone dextrose; FIP-mco, FIP from M. conica SH; rFIP-mco, the recombinant protein of FIP-mco.
